# UNS Framework

> An open-source ecosystem for building a Unified Namespace (UNS) in manufacturing — a single, shared data layer that replaces point-to-point integrations between factory systems.

The UNS Framework consists of three projects:

1. **UNS Framework Standard** — An open standard that defines how to structure manufacturing data in MQTT using YAML files. ISA-95 topic hierarchy, versioned namespaces, payload conventions.
2. **fnkit** — A lightweight Functions-as-a-Service platform that runs anywhere containers run. Write functions in Go, Node.js, or Python. Deploy via git push.
3. **fn-uns** — Serverless functions that implement a complete UNS data pipeline on fnkit. Capture, process, and report on real-time factory data.
